data.regulatory_notice: These guidelines are provided to help you comply with applicable requirements and to help ensure Our's platform remains compliant with global telecommunications ecosystem requirements. They represent our current understanding of common compliance requirements generally applicable to Our and its customers, and do not constitute legal advice. By posting these guidelines, Our makes no assurances regarding the legal compliance of your application built using our APIs. You are expected to understand and abide by all compliance obligations applicable to your specific application. You should check these pages regularly for updates as telecommunications ecosystem requirements continue to evolve and change, and the information below may be updated or changed without notice.

address.note: Address must be within the locality or region covered by the phone number's prefix; PO Box not acceptable

business_address.note: Business address must be within the locality or region covered by the phone number's prefix; PO Box not acceptable

concatenated_support.note: For certain sender ID types this may not be supported based on encoding

sms_guidelines.mms_support: Converted to SMS with embedded URL

landline_sending.behaviour: API returns 400 error 21614; message not logged or charged

compliance_best_practices: Get opt-in consent before sending communications
Only send during daytime hours unless urgent
Support HELP/STOP in user's local language
Do not contact users on do‑not‑call or do‑not‑disturb registries
Gambling and lottery-related content is strictly prohibited

outbound_restrictions.spoofed_verified_caller_id: Starting July 2022, blocked by Finnish carriers

porting_guidelines.timeframe: 2–4 weeks after submission, depending on complexity and current provider

data.footer_notice: These guidelines represent Our’s current understanding... and do not constitute legal advice. You are expected to understand and abide by all compliance obligations. Check the page regularly for updates.

allowed: Dual functional two-way traffic (SMS and Voice)

notes: For the benefit of all our customers, these guidelines are provided to help you comply with applicable requirements and to help ensure Our's platform remains compliant with global telecommunications ecosystem requirements.
These guidelines represent our current understanding of common compliance requirements generally applicable to Our and its customers, and do not constitute legal advice.
By posting these guidelines, Our makes no assurances regarding the legal compliance of your application built using our APIs.
You are expected to understand and abide by all compliance obligations applicable to your specific application.
You should check these pages regularly for updates as telecommunications ecosystem requirements continue to evolve and change, and the information below may be updated or changed without notice.

Proof of Address: Correspondence with government departments (no more than 3 months old): Tax return, Student loan statement, Voter registration
Correspondence with banks or financial institutions (no more than 3 months old): Bank statement, Credit card account statement
Correspondence with public utilities (no more than 3 months old): Electricity bill, Water bill, Gas bill
Correspondence with operators of public telecommunications services: Mobile telecom bill, Fixed telephone bill, Internet service bill, Pay TV service bill
Correspondence with government departments (no more than 3 months old): Business Registration Certificate
Correspondence with banks or financial institutions (no more than 3 months old): Bank statement, Credit card account statement
Correspondence with public utilities (no more than 3 months old): Electricity bill, Water bill, Gas bill
Correspondence with operators of public telecommunications services: Mobile telecom bill, Fixed telephone bill, Internet service bill, Pay TV service bill

individuals.notes: Address may be anywhere in the world; no documentation required

businesses.notes: Address may be anywhere in the world; no documentation required

Our_sms_support.mms_support: Converted to SMS with embedded URL

compliance_considerations: Get opt‑in consent from each end user before sending any communication, particularly for marketing or non‑essential communications.
Only communicate during an end user’s daytime hours unless it is urgent.
SMS campaigns should support HELP/STOP messages, and similar messages, in the end user’s local language.
Do not contact end users on do‑not‑call or do‑not‑disturb registries.
Message delivery to M2M numbers is on a best‑effort basis only.
